title: In Syria, U.N. Promotes Local Ceasefires To Offer Relief From Civil War
teaser: UN Special Envoy Staffan de Mistura stood amid the ruins of Homs, Syria, this week, saying it is time for a new approach. He's pushing for a local truce between the regime and rebels.
